Annotations for test configuration.

Package for interface with the AspectJ compiler and LTW agent.

Cooperative scheduler implementation.
org.cooperari.core.util - package org.cooperari.core.util
Utility classes.
org.cooperari.errors - package org.cooperari.errors
Cooperari error classes, related to aspects like runtime execution events (e.g., deadlock or race detection), invalid configuration options, internal errors, etc.
org.cooperari.feature - package org.cooperari.feature
Root package for feature implementations.
org.cooperari.feature.atomic - package org.cooperari.feature.atomic
Yields points for methods in java.util.concurrent.AtomicXXX classes.

Support for data access yield points and race detection.
org.cooperari.feature.hotspots - package org.cooperari.feature.hotspots
Hotspot reachability feature.
org.cooperari.feature.monitor - package org.cooperari.feature.monitor
Yield point support for Java monitor operations and related deadlock detection.
org.cooperari.feature.thread - package org.cooperari.feature.thread
Yield point support Thread life-cycle methods.
org.cooperari.feature.threadrunner - package org.cooperari.feature.threadrunner
Support for the "fork-and-join" thread runner.
org.cooperari.feature.unsafe - package org.cooperari.feature.unsafe
Support for yield points in calls to methods to sun.misc.Unsafe.

Cooperari bindings for JUnit.
